definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
portrait/to do a portrait of sb

sentences.english: Scenes from the 17th century landscape paintings were replicated as Arcadian scenes.
sentences.chinese: 場景從17世紀景觀作爲田園場景複製畫。

sentences.english: A black dress person into Cao Zhai night, stole Cao Fu a picture, and leave a mark.
sentences.chinese: 一黑衣人夜入曹宅，盜走曹父的一幅畫，並留下記號。

sentences.english: The picture was hung on the line.
sentences.chinese: 在牆上顯眼的地方掛着一幅畫。

sentences.english: Place your drawing over the transfer paper.
sentences.chinese: 把你的畫放在轉印紙上。

sentences.english: Rather, it conjures up a quiet and dutiful domesticity.
sentences.chinese: 但這幅畫營造出一種安靜祥和且各司其職的家庭生活。

sentences.english: I do a little bit of pencil drawing myself in miniature.
sentences.chinese: 我自己會動手畫一些微型鉛筆畫。

sentences.english: I sent in three paintings for the competition.
sentences.chinese: 我交了三幅畫參加比賽。

sentences.english: A large-scdraugustht beer painting! usuficnearlyy on a wa certainy ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 一樣平常掛在牆上或天花板上的巨幅畫。

sentences.english: A large-scale painting, usually on a wall or ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 一般掛正在牆上或天花板上的巨幅畫。

sentences.english: Richard draws a picture each day.
sentences.chinese: 理查德每天都畫一幅畫。
咱們把這幅畫塗成藍色。

sentences.english: I will never draw like them. But they will never draw like me.
sentences.chinese: 但是同時，他們也永遠不可能畫出“我的畫”。

sentences.english: In Hitler's entourage this drawing was regarded as blasphemous.
sentences.chinese: 希特勒周圍的人把我這幅畫看作是侮漫不敬。

sentences.english: This painting came under the hammer at Christies today.
sentences.chinese: 這幅畫今天由克里斯蒂拍賣行拍賣了。

definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
to copy (a model of calligraphy or painting etc)
